rev.comment: /* Police violence at Occupy UC Davis */
rev.diff:
Line 47: Line 47:
The 35 or so officers present said that they had felt surrounded as several hundred demonstrators had gathered. 10 were arrested and two officers have been suspended.<ref name = âCSMâ>[http://www.csmonitor.com/USA/2011/1120/UC-Davis-pepper-spray-incident-goes-viral/%28page%29/2 Brad Knickerbocker, âUC Davis pepper spray incident goes viralâ, The Christian Science Monitor, 20 November 2011]</ref>
The 35 or so officers present said that they had felt surrounded as several hundred demonstrators had gathered. 10 were arrested and two officers have been suspended.<ref name = âCSMâ>[http://www.csmonitor.com/USA/2011/1120/UC-Davis-pepper-spray-incident-goes-viral/%28page%29/2 Brad Knickerbocker, âUC Davis pepper spray incident goes viralâ, The Christian Science Monitor, 20 November 2011]</ref>
â
According to participants, one of the officers who used [[pepper spray]] was identified as Lieutenant John Pike of Davis, California. <ref>[http://www.huliq.com/10178/video-pepper-spray-aftermath-uc-davis-professor-demands-chancellors-resignation "Video In pepper spray aftermath"]</ref> He has since been suspended from duty and is on administrative leave. <ref>http://www.guardian.co.uk/world/2011/nov/20/uc-davis-pepper-spray-video</ref>
+
According to participants, one of the officers who used [[pepper spray]] was identified as Lieutenant John Pike of Davis, California. <ref>[http://www.huliq.com/10178/video-pepper-spray-aftermath-uc-davis-professor-demands-chancellors-resignation "Video In pepper spray aftermath"]</ref> He has since been suspended from duty and is on administrative leave. <ref>http://www.guardian.co.uk/world/2011/nov/20/uc-davis-pepper-spray-video</ref> Another involved officer was placed on administrative leave, as was UC Davis Police Chief Annette Spicuzza.<ref>[http://www.nydailynews.com/news/national/uc-davis-police-chief-put-leave-tensions-continue-rise-pepper-spray-incident-article-1.980841?localLinksEnabled=false UC Davis police chief put on leave as tensions continue to rise after pepper spray incident]
<gallery>
<gallery>
Line 75: Line 75:
On November 19, Katehi called for creation of a task force to review the incident and report their findings and recommendations within 90 days.<ref> {{cite news |newspaper= [[Los Angeles Times]] |title=UC Davis chief launches probe into pepper-spraying of Occupy protesters |url=http://www.latimes.com/news/local/la-me-occupy-uc-davis-20111120,0,2407596.story |first1=Paul |last1= Pringle | first2=Sam
On November 19, Katehi called for creation of a task force to review the incident and report their findings and recommendations within 90 days.<ref> {{cite news |newspaper= [[Los Angeles Times]] |title=UC Davis chief launches probe into pepper-spraying of Occupy protesters |url=http://www.latimes.com/news/local/la-me-occupy-uc-davis-20111120,0,2407596.story |first1=Paul |last1= Pringle | first2=Sam
â
| last2=Quinones | date= 19 November 2011 | accessdate = 21 Nobember 2011}}</ref><sup>,</sup><ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.kcra.com/r/29813746/detail.html|title=Task Force Created To Review Pepper Spray Incident|publisher=KCRA-TV|accessdate=2011-11-19}}</ref> That same day, approximately 1000 students and supporters participated in a silent protest against the Chancellor. <ref>[http://www.dailykos.com/story/2011/11/20/1038428/-UC-Davis:-Speechless?via=blog_650155 UC Davis: Speechless ]</ref>
+
| last2=Quinones | date= 19 November 2011 | accessdate = 21 Nobember 2011}}</ref><sup>,</sup><ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.kcra.com/r/29813746/detail.html|title=Task Force Created To Review Pepper Spray Incident|publisher=KCRA-TV|accessdate=2011-11-19}}</ref> said she was putting the campus police chief on administrative leave as a way to rebuild trust on campus. That evening, approximately 1000 students and supporters participated in a silent protest against the Chancellor. <ref>[http://www.dailykos.com/story/2011/11/20/1038428/-UC-Davis:-Speechless?via=blog_650155 UC Davis: Speechless ]</ref>
